CustomField.description: Indicates if line level approval is required for QTC NCQ type of quote
CustomField.formula: AND(CPQ_IsNCQ__c , OR(ISBLANK(NokiaCPQ_Floor_Price__c) , ISNULL(NokiaCPQ_Floor_Price__c) , Apttus_Config2__NetPrice__c < ( NokiaCPQ_Floor_Price__c * Apttus_Config2__Quantity__c ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if line level approval is required for QTC NCQ type of quote
CustomField.label: Approval Required (QTC NCQ)
